TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Club extends System.Object

Docs.summary: To be added.
Settings dictating what actions users can take within the club depending on their role.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Windows.Foundation.Collections.IVectorView`1<valuetype Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Clubs.ClubRole>> AddClubModeratorAsync([in]string xuid) runtime managed

Docs.param: The xuid of the user to promote.
Docs.summary: Promotes the specified user to moderator of the club. The specified user must already be a member of the club. Can only be called by the club owner.
Docs.returns: An IVectorView containing the roles the target user now has with the club.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Windows.Foundation.Collections.IVectorView`1<valuetype Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Clubs.ClubRole>> AddUserToClubAsync() runtime managed

Docs.summary: Attempts to join a club. If the user has not yet been invited, this call will send a request to join the club which will need to be approved by a moderator before the caller becomes a member.
Docs.returns: An IVectorView containing the roles the calling user now has with the club.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Windows.Foundation.Collections.IVectorView`1<valuetype Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Clubs.ClubRole>> AddUserToClubAsync([in]string xuid) runtime managed

Docs.param: The xuid of the user to add.
Docs.summary: Depending on the role of the caller, this function will have a different effect: 1) If the caller is a moderator of the club, the target user will be either invited or added as a club member immediately. In order for the target user to be added immediately, they have to have previously requested to join using the AddUserToClubAsync method. Moderators can examine the roster to get a list of users who have requested to join. 2) If the caller is a member of the club, but not a moderator, the target user will be recommended for the club. For the user to be finally added as a member, AddUserToClubAsync still must be called by a club moderator AND AddUserToClubAsync must be called by the target user. Note: If the club doesn't support recommendations, an error will be returned. 3) If the target user is the caller, this method will have the same exact behavior as AddUserToClubAsync()
Docs.returns: An IVectorView containing the roles the target user now has with the club.

Docs.summary: Club's background image url

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Windows.Foundation.Collections.IVectorView`1<valuetype Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Clubs.ClubRole>> BanUserFromClubAsync([in]string xuid) runtime managed

Docs.param: The xuid of the user to ban.
Docs.summary: Bans the specified user from the club. Can only be called by club moderators or owner.
Docs.returns: An IVectorView containing the roles the target user now has with the club.

Docs.summary: When the club was created.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Windows.Foundation.Collections.IVectorView`1<valuetype Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Clubs.ClubRole>> FollowClubAsync() runtime managed

Docs.summary: Adds the calling user as a follower of the specified club.
Docs.returns: An IVectorView containing the roles the calling user now has with the club.

Docs.summary: Number of followers of the club.
Club founder's Xuid.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Windows.Foundation.Collections.IVectorView`1<class Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Clubs.ClubUserPresenceRecord>> GetClubUserPresenceRecordsAsync() runtime managed

Docs.summary: Gets details about (at most) the last 1000 members active within a club.
Docs.returns: An IVectorView containing ClubUserPresenceRecord describing the presence of the club's members.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Clubs.ClubPresenceCounts> GetPresenceCountsAsync() runtime managed

Docs.summary: Gets information about club member presence.
Docs.returns: A ClubPresenceCounts object indicating the number of club members present currently/today

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Windows.Foundation.Collections.IVectorView`1<class Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Clubs.ClubRoleRecord>> GetRoleRecordsAsync() runtime managed

Docs.summary: Returns records of the callers roles within the club.
Docs.returns: A vector containing the club_role_records which describe the history of a users roles in the club. If the user has no association with the club an empty vector will be returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Windows.Foundation.Collections.IVectorView`1<class Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Clubs.ClubRoleRecord>> GetRoleRecordsAsync([in]string xuid) runtime managed

Docs.param: Xuid of the user whose roles to query
Docs.summary: Returns records for a given users roles within the club.
Docs.returns: A vector containing the club_role_records which describe the history of a users roles in the club. If the user has no association with the club an empty vector will be returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Windows.Foundation.Collections.IVectorView`1<valuetype Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Clubs.ClubRole>> GetRolesAsync([in]string xuid) runtime managed

Docs.summary: Returns the roles a given user has within the club.
Docs.returns: An IVectorView containing the ClubRoles the user has within the club. If the user has no association with the club an empty vector will be returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Clubs.ClubRoster> GetRosterAsync() runtime managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves a roster of club members that have a special relationship with the club (something other than just member).
Docs.returns: A ClubRoster object which contains the moderators, recommended users, banned users, and users who have requested to join the club.

Docs.summary: Club's display image url
ClubId

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Windows.Foundation.Collections.IVectorView`1<valuetype Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Clubs.ClubRole>> RemoveClubModeratorAsync([in]string xuid) runtime managed

Docs.param: The xuid of the user to demote.
Docs.summary: Removes the specified user as a moderator of the club. They will retain there other roles within the club. Can only be called by the club owner.
Docs.returns: An IVectorView containing the roles the target user now has with the club.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Windows.Foundation.Collections.IVectorView`1<valuetype Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Clubs.ClubRole>> RemoveUserFromClubAsync() runtime managed

Docs.summary: Deletes all relationships the calling user has with a club including: membership, outstanding invitations, recommendations to join, and following.
Docs.returns: An IVectorView containing the roles the calling user now has with the club. If the call succeeds, it will not contain any role other than "banned".

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Windows.Foundation.Collections.IVectorView`1<valuetype Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Clubs.ClubRole>> RemoveUserFromClubAsync([in]string xuid) runtime managed

Docs.param: The xuid of the user to remove.
Docs.summary: Removes all relationships between the target user and the club including: membership, outstanding invitations/recommendations, and following. Can only be called by club moderator (or on yourself, which has the same effect as calling RemoveUserFromClubAsync())
Docs.returns: An IVectorView containing the roles the target user now has with the club.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncAction RenameClubAsync([in]string newName) runtime managed

Docs.param: New name to give the club
Docs.summary: Renames the club. Can only be called by the club owner. Some restrictions apply when renaming and public or private club; hidden clubs can be renamed freely. Note that the club object this is called from will not be updated with the new name even if this method is successful, but if the club object is retrieved again the new name will be reflected.
Number of reports for the club.
Number of reported items for the club.
Number of users requesting to join the club.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncAction SetPresenceWithinClubAsync([in]valuetype Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Clubs.ClubUserPresence presence) runtime managed

Docs.param: The current presence state of the user
Docs.summary: Sets the user's presence within the club. This keeps track of which club page, if any, the user is currently viewing.
Club short name
When the club remains suspended until.
Title family Id
Localized Title Family Name
Type (visibility) of club

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Windows.Foundation.Collections.IVectorView`1<valuetype Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Clubs.ClubRole>> UnbanUserFromClubAsync([in]string xuid) runtime managed

Docs.param: The xuid of the user to ban.
Docs.summary: Unbans the specified user from the club. Can only be called by club moderators or owner. Note: A similar affect can also be achieved by a moderator calling add_user_to_club. In that case however, banned users will immediately receive an invitation to the club in addition to being unbanned.
Docs.returns: An IVectorView containing the roles the target user now has with the club.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Windows.Foundation.Collections.IVectorView`1<valuetype Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Clubs.ClubRole>> UnfollowClubAsync() runtime managed

Docs.summary: Removes the calling user as a follower of the specified club.
Docs.returns: An IVectorView containing the roles the calling user now has with the club.

Docs.summary: Roles the viewer has in the club
